thread.section_title: Energia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Energia | energia.ie | 7 of 38
thread.title: Anthony Brogan

author: Anthony Brogan
title: Anthony Brogan
text: Going out of contract I rang to ask what offer there was for me to stay.I could tell the lady what discounts I was on. She checked and said it would be possible to stay on those rates for the coming year. Of course I had been window shopping. I asked for a particular better rate. Oh!, she said, you have been looking at comparison sites. She seemed surprised that anyone would do such a thing! She would have to ask management she said. She came back and said yes I could have the rates I'd asked for. Why did I have to do all this to get an available better rate? Loyalty, my eye.
